chapter.title: Using Spring AMQP
chapter.para: In this chapter, we will explore interface and classes that are the essential components for developing applications with Spring AMQP.

sect1.title: AMQP Abstractions
sect1.para: Discuss classes in the org.springframework.amqp.core package such as Queue, Binding, Message MessageProperties etc.

sect1.title: Connection and resource management
sect1.para: Discuss CachingConnectionFactory and future support for failove of connections.

sect1.title: Sending messages
sect1.para: Use of RabbitTemplate to send a message

sect1.title: Receiving messages
sect1.para: Use of RabbitTemplate for sync recieve and MessageListenerContiner for async
